resources.string:
App is designed to fixed the SOD (Sleep of Death) issue that has plagued the Nexus 4. This is an app for my own use, however it might be useful for other users who are Nexus 4 owners or owners of other devices that has the sleep of death problem.

To enable, just click "Enable SOD". This will create a wake lock and will not allow your device to sleep, which hopefully mean you are less likely to get the SOD issue. I feel sometimes if the device falls into deep sleep that it cannot be woken up and causes the SOD issue. Because the app keeps your device awake you will notice that the app will consume more battery, which is a trade off for having your phone turn on.

If you still experience problems you can keep SOD Killer running in the foreground. This will set a notification in your notification tray.

Permission
Run at startup - So if you restart the phone and you have allowed the app to keep the wakelock, the program will keep a wakelock.

Prevent phone from sleeping - We are keeping a wakelock, so this is obvious....
